Frequently Asked Questions

How do you handle project pricing?

+

We provide detailed quotes based on your specific requirements. Our pricing is transparent and includes all necessary components for project success. We offer flexible engagement models from fixed-price projects to time-and-materials contracts.

What's your typical project timeline?

+

Timelines vary based on project complexity, but we always provide realistic estimates and keep you updated throughout the development process. Simple projects can be completed in 2-4 weeks, while complex enterprise solutions may take 3-6 months.

Do you provide ongoing support?

+

Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance services for all our solutions to ensure continued success. Our support includes bug fixes, feature updates, performance optimization, and continuous monitoring services.

Can you work with our existing team?

+

Absolutely! We're experienced in collaborating with in-house teams and can integrate seamlessly with your existing workflows. We can work as an extension of your team or provide dedicated resources for specific projects.

What technologies do you specialize in?

+

We specialize in modern technologies including React Native, Flutter, Unity, Unreal Engine, Python, Node.js, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, and many more. Our team stays updated with the latest industry trends and best practices.

Do you offer free consultations?

+

Yes, we offer free initial consultations to discuss your project requirements, provide technical recommendations, and give you a realistic timeline and cost estimate. This helps ensure we're the right fit for your needs.
